column4: Seriously, anyone who believe they are pretty good in networking... could you have a look at this ? I'm trying to connect to my router using eth0... I believe I've read everything that's available and tried everything from friends and own experience
http://paste.ubuntu.com/27393/
http://paste.ubuntu.com/27408/
any reason you dont want to use dhcp?
you never installed a dhcp client?
unless it comes with the standard installation of the ubuntu server... but i don't have the dhcpcd
dhclient
I did, check the link
seems like something on the 255.255.255.255 is fucking up
I believe a misconfiguration of something in my ubuntu box
i doubt you want your subnet to be 255.255.255.255
it's not ... it's set to .0 yea, and what about the language?
about the language, try to keep it family friendly here :)
using a wifi card? apple airport?
using a direct wired ethernet cable, plugged into an apple airport extrem
using the rj45 ethernet
ping to gateway works... just doesnt go out of the network range (aka google.ping doesnt work)
do: sudo ifconfig eth0 down     then     sudo ifconfig eth0 up    then    sudo dhclient eth0
other machines can get out though im assuming
correct
kk thanks for trying, I appreciate :)
